Description: Clay tablet; nearly complete; real estate sale; Old Babylonian.
Curator's comments: The case for this tablet is 1891,0509.2464.A (BM.82417).
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.294)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
